resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105711</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105711</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207034</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Tracking Habitat Change</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichlauf Der Lebensraum-Änderung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cheminement du Changement d'Habitat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Seguindo A Mudança Do Habitat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inseguimento Del Cambiamento Dell'Habitat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλλαγή βιότοπων καταδίωξης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Seguir El Cambio Del Habitat</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is an electronic field trip to learn about habitat and how scientists use technology to understand habitat change. This live satellite event on March 4, 2004, will take students to Nevada and New Mexico to join scientists examining factors that are changing the habitat of the sage-grouse and prairie chicken.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist ein elektronisches auffangen Reise, um
über Lebensraum zu erlernen und wie man die 
Wissenschaftlergebrauchtechnologie Lebensraumänderung versteht. 
Dieser Phasensatellitenfall an März 4, 2004, nimmt 
Kursteilnehmer nach Nevada und New-Mexico, um die Wissenschaftler zu 
verbinden, die Faktoren überprüfen, die den Lebensraum des 
Salbei-Klage und Graslandhuhns ändern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est un voyage de zone électronique à se 
renseigner sur l'habitat et comment technologie d'utilisation de 
scientifiques comprendre le changement d'habitat. Cet 
événement satellite de phase 4 mars 2004, portera des étudiants au
Nevada et au Nouveau-Mexique pour joindre des scientifiques examinant 
les facteurs qui changent l'habitat du poulet de sauge-grouse et de 
prairie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é um desengate de campo eletrônico a aprender 
sobre o habitat e como tecnologia do uso dos cientistas compreender a 
mudança do habitat. Este evento satellite vivo março em 4, 
2004, fará exame de estudantes a Nevada e a Novo México para juntar 
os cientistas que examinam os fatores que estão mudando o habitat da 
galinha do sábio-sage-grouse e da pradaria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è un viaggio di campo elettronico da imparare 
circa l'habitat e come tecnologia di uso degli scienziati capire il 
cambiamento dell'habitat. Questo evento satellite in tensione il
4 marzo 2004, prenderà gli allievi nel Nevada e nel Nuovo Messico per
unire gli scienziati che esaminano i fattori che stanno cambiando 
l'habitat del pollo del prairie e di salvia-sage-grouse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι ένα ηλεκτρονικό ταξίδι πεδίων που μαθαίνει για
το βιότοπο και πώς οι επιστήμονες χρησιμοποιούν την τεχνολογία 
για να καταλάβουν την αλλαγή βιότοπων. Αυτό το ζωντανό 
δορυφορικό γεγονός στις 4 Μαρτίου ..2004, θα πάρει τους 
σπουδαστές στη Νεβάδα και το New Mexico για να ενώσει τους 
επιστήμονες που εξετάζουν τους παράγοντες που αλλάζουν το βιότοπο
του κοτόπουλου λογικός-αγριόγαλλων και λιβαδιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es un disparo al campo electrónico a aprender 
sobre habitat y cómo tecnología del uso de los científicos entender
el cambio del habitat. Este acontecimiento basado en los 
satélites vivo de marcha la 4 de 2004, llevará a estudiantes a 
Nevada y a New México para ensamblar a científicos que examinan los 
factores que están cambiando el habitat del pollo del 
sabio-sage-grouse y de la pradera.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207034</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105711</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/tracking-habitat-change</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
